title: The Directorate of industries will develop a web portal on which the developer of every IT park will be bound to provide/update detailed information about names of the units in the park, utilization of built-up area and activities being carried out, manpower employed in the It Park for IT/ITES and support services on yearly basis
clause_text: The Directorate of industries will develop a web portal on which the developer of every IT park will be bound to provide/update detailed information about names of the units in the park, utilization of built-up area and activities being carried out, manpower employed in the It Park for IT/ITES and support services on yearly basis.
